meta.title: Contract #001: Temple Bar
meta.description: TUTORIAL: Link events using Cause (=>). Click Source, then Target.
meta.journal: Simple assault. CCTV confirms Subject A initiated physical contact. Subject B's retaliation was reactive, not preemptive. Case closed.

nodes.text: 23:14 - CCTV: Subject A spills pint on Subject B's shoes.
23:15 - Witness: Subject B shouts insults and pushes Subject A.
23:15 - CCTV: Subject A punches Subject B.
23:20 - Garda Log: Patrol unit arrests Subject A for assault.
